languages.text: "И за это мы должны простить твои прошлые прегрешения? Простолюдинка Ризза, ты обвиняешься в пиратстве, пособничестве мятежникам, а также в богохульной ереси и почитании Губительных сил. {name}, отдаю тебе право свершить правосудие Императора".

traits.locale_text: "И за это мы должны простить твои прошлые прегрешения? Простолюдинка Ризза, ты обвиняешься в пиратстве, пособничестве мятежникам, а также в богохульной ереси и почитании Губительных сил. {name}, отдаю тебе право свершить правосудие Императора".

languages.text: "And because of that, we are supposed to pardon you for your past offences? Commoner Ryzza, you are charged with piracy, with aiding and abetting rebels, and with blasphemous heresy and worship of the Ruinous Powers. {name}, I grant you the right to enact the Emperor's justice."
languages.original_text: "И за это мы должны простить твои прошлые прегрешения? Простолюдинка Ризза, ты обвиняешься в пиратстве, пособничестве мятежникам, а также в богохульной ереси и почитании Губительных сил. {name}, отдаю тебе право свершить правосудие Императора".

traits.locale_text: "And for that, we are supposed to forgive your past offences? Commoner Ryzza, you are charged with piracy, with aiding and abetting rebels, and with blasphemous heresy and worship of the Ruinous Powers. {name}, I grant you the right to exact the Emperor's justice."

"And for that, we are supposed to forgive your past offences? Commoner Ryzza, you are charged with piracy, with aiding and abetting rebels, and with blasphemous heresy and worship of the Ruinous Powers. {name}, I grant you the right to exact the Emperor's justice."

"And because of that, we are supposed to pardon you for your past offences? Commoner Ryzza, you are charged with piracy, with aiding and abetting rebels, and with blasphemous heresy and worship of the Ruinous Powers. {name}, I grant you the right to exact the Emperor's justice."

"And because of that, we are supposed to pardon you for your past offences? Commoner Ryzza, you are charged with piracy, with aiding and abetting rebels, and with blasphemous heresy and worship of the Ruinous Powers. {name}, I grant you the right to exact the Emperor's justice."

"And because of that, we are supposed to pardon you for your past offences? Commoner Ryzza, you are charged with piracy, with aiding and abetting rebels, and with blasphemous heresy and worship of the Ruinous Powers. {name}, I grant you the right to enact the Emperor's justice."

"And because of that, we are supposed to pardon you for your past offences? Commoner Ryzza, you are charged with piracy, with aiding and abetting rebels, and with blasphemous heresy and worship of the Ruinous Powers. {name}, I grant you the right to enact the Emperor's justice."

languages.text: “难道就因为这一点，我们就应该赦免你过去犯下的罪行吗？平民莱萨，本法院指控你犯下了海盗罪、协助叛乱罪、教唆叛军罪、异端亵渎罪，以及崇拜毁灭之力罪。{name}，我允许你伸张帝皇的正义。”
languages.original_text: "And because of that, we are supposed to pardon you for your past offences? Commoner Ryzza, you are charged with piracy, with aiding and abetting rebels, and with blasphemous heresy and worship of the Ruinous Powers. {name}, I grant you the right to enact the Emperor's justice."

traits.locale_text: “难道就因为这一点，我们就应该赦免你过去犯下的罪行吗？平民莱萨，本法院指控你犯下了海盗罪、协助叛乱罪、教唆叛军罪、异端亵渎罪，以及崇拜毁灭之力罪。{name}，我允许你伸张帝皇的正义。”

languages.text: 「そんな理由で、お前の過去の罪を許せと？平民ライツァよ、お前は海賊行為、反逆者幇助、異端への冒涜、〈禍つ神々〉崇拝の罪に問われている。{name}、 皇帝の裁きを仰ぐ権利を与えよう」
languages.original_text: "And because of that, we are supposed to pardon you for your past offences? Commoner Ryzza, you are charged with piracy, with aiding and abetting rebels, and with blasphemous heresy and worship of the Ruinous Powers. {name}, I grant you the right to enact the Emperor's justice."

traits.locale_text: 「そんな理由で、お前の過去の罪を許せと？平民ライツァよ、お前は海賊行為、反逆者幇助、異端への冒涜、〈禍つ神々〉崇拝の罪に問われている。{name}、 皇帝の裁きを仰ぐ権利を与えよう」

languages.text: «¿Y por eso se supone que debemos perdonarle sus delitos? Ryzza, se le acusa de piratería, de ayudar e instigar a rebeldes y de herejía y adoración a los Poderes Ruinosos. {name}, le concedo el derecho de llevar a cabo la justicia del Emperador».
languages.original_text: "And because of that, we are supposed to pardon you for your past offences? Commoner Ryzza, you are charged with piracy, with aiding and abetting rebels, and with blasphemous heresy and worship of the Ruinous Powers. {name}, I grant you the right to enact the Emperor's justice."

traits.locale_text: «¿Y por eso se supone que debemos perdonarle sus delitos? Ryzza, se le acusa de piratería, de ayudar e instigar a rebeldes y de herejía y adoración a los Poderes Ruinosos. {name}, le concedo el derecho de exigir la justicia del Emperador».

languages.text: "Und deswegen sollen wir Euch für Eure früheren Vergehen begnadigen? Ryzza, Ihr werdet der Piraterie angeklagt, der Beihilfe zur Rebellion und der blasphemischen Ketzerei und Anbetung der Mächte der Zerstörung. {name}, ich gewähre Euch das Recht, die Gerechtigkeit des Imperators auszuführen."
languages.original_text: "And because of that, we are supposed to pardon you for your past offences? Commoner Ryzza, you are charged with piracy, with aiding and abetting rebels, and with blasphemous heresy and worship of the Ruinous Powers. {name}, I grant you the right to enact the Emperor's justice."

traits.locale_text: "Und deswegen sollen wir Euch für Eure früheren Vergehen begnadigen? Ryzza, Ihr werdet der Piraterie angeklagt, der Beihilfe zur Rebellion und der blasphemischen Ketzerei und Anbetung der Mächte der Zerstörung. {name}, ich gewähre Euch das Recht, die Gerechtigkeit des Imperators auszuführen."

languages.text: « Et vous croyez sérieusement que cela vous exonère de vos délits passés ? Roturière Ryzza, vous êtes accusée de piraterie, de soutien aux rebelles, d'hérésie et de vénération des Puissances de la Ruine. {name}, je vous donne le droit d'appliquer la justice de l'Empereur. »
languages.original_text: "And because of that, we are supposed to pardon you for your past offences? Commoner Ryzza, you are charged with piracy, with aiding and abetting rebels, and with blasphemous heresy and worship of the Ruinous Powers. {name}, I grant you the right to enact the Emperor's justice."

traits.locale_text: « Et vous croyez sérieusement que cela vous exonère de vos délits passés ? Roturière Ryzza, vous êtes accusée de piraterie, de soutien aux rebelles, d'hérésie et de vénération des Puissances de la Ruine. {name}, je vous donne le droit d'appliquer la justice de l'Empereur. »

languages.text: "Bu yüzden de geçmiş suçlarını af mı etmemiz gerekiyor? Avam kesimden Ryzza, korsanlıktan, isyancılara yardım ve yataklık etmekten ve din dışı kâfirlikten ve Yıkıcı Güçler'e tapınmaktan suçlanıyorsun. {name}, İmparator'un adaletini yerine getirme hakkını sana veriyorum."
languages.original_text: "And because of that, we are supposed to pardon you for your past offences? Commoner Ryzza, you are charged with piracy, with aiding and abetting rebels, and with blasphemous heresy and worship of the Ruinous Powers. {name}, I grant you the right to enact the Emperor's justice."

traits.locale_text: "Bu yüzden de geçmiş suçlarını af mı etmemiz gerekiyor? Avam kesimden Ryzza, korsanlıktan, isyancılara yardım ve yataklık etmekten ve din dışı kâfirlikten ve Yıkıcı Güçlere tapınmaktan suçlanıyorsun. {name}, İmparator'un adaletini yerine getirme hakkını sana veriyorum."
